amendment.description: Amendment reduces the funds for the Department of Energy departmental administration account by $10,000,000, and increases the funds for Yucca Mountain licensing under the Nuclear Regulatory Commission by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Department of Energy salary and expenses account by $10,000,000, and increase the Nuclear Regulatory Commission salaries and expenses account by $10,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shimkus amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 326 - 81 (Roll no. 321).
